metadata.description: Domain expert skills powered by SpiceAI hybrid search

plugins.name: dw3-skills
plugins.description: Domain expert skills for Claude Code. Uses spice CLI directly. Requires spice on PATH and SPICE_CLOUD_API_KEY set.

plugins.name: dw3-skills-cowork
plugins.description: Domain expert skills for Cowork (first attempt). Uses MCP server to bridge spice CLI from host into the Cowork VM. Requires Bun and SPICE_CLOUD_API_KEY set.

plugins.name: dw3-skills-cowork-official
plugins.description: Domain expert skills for Cowork (official). Built with create-cowork-plugin skill using Node.js MCP server. Covers cloud architecture (AWS), security compliance (HIPAA/HITRUST/SOC2), QA standards, and UX design (WCAG). Requires Node.js, npm install in mcp-server/, and SPICE_CLOUD_API_KEY.
